description: Mobile techniques used by Android/Chuli.A, ATT&CK software S0304 v1.1
name: Android/Chuli.A (S0304)

techniques.comment: Android/Chuli.A stole contact list data stored both on the the phone and the SIM card.
Android/Chuli.A used SMS to receive command and control messages.
Android/Chuli.A was delivered via a spearphishing message containing a malicious Android application as an attachment.
Android/Chuli.A gathered device data including phone number, OS version, phone model, and SDK version.
Android/Chuli.A used HTTP uploads to a URL as a command and control mechanism.
